original_title: The Pokey Little Puppy's Favorite Stories
overview: 3 Best-Loved Stories (1985) "The Poky Little Puppy and the Patchwork Blanket" "The Sailor Dog" "Little Toad To The Rescue" Re-released in 1994 as "The Best Stories 5"(an earlier re-release was titled: "The Pokey Little Puppy's Favorite Stories")
title: The Pokey Little Puppy's Favorite Stories
